body_html:
No matter how small a variable you create TF preallocates GPU memory.
The randomness may come from the concurrency, the exact timing where you start both programs.

In any case, this is the expected behaviour from TF.
You can search for CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY to read more about this, there are quite a few github issues filed about this problem.

In any case, this is the expected behaviour from TF.
You can search for CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY to read more about this, there are quite a few github issues filed about this problem.
body:
No matter how small a variable you create TF preallocates GPU memory.
The randomness may come from the concurrency, the exact timing where you start both programs.

In any case, this is the expected behaviour from TF.
You can search for `CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY` to read more about this, there are quite a few github issues filed about this problem.
